netmuseclient

Class UnZipIt

  • java.lang.Object
    • netmuseclient.UnZipIt

  • public class UnZipIt
extends java.lang.Object
    UnZipIt.java - a class for reading files in a zip Modifications by Bogdan Vera for loading transparent PNGs: Added PImage loadImageSync(Image awtImage), which loads a PImage from an AWT image. Made changes to loadImage() so it can load transparent pngs. Some modifications based on: http://processing.org/discourse/beta/num_1194145248.html
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Yonas Sandbæk
